definitions.definition: Of very poor quality; unpleasant; distasteful.
examples: That is such a crappy car.
The referee just made a really crappy call.
The food there used to be good but now it's crappy .
definitions.label_groups: chiefly Canada , US , colloquial , mildly vulgar

examples: I'm feeling really crappy - I think I need some fresh air.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly Canada , US , colloquial , mildly vulgar , especially with "feel"

examples: Put the crappy diapers in the brown pail and the wet ones in the yellow pail.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly Canada , US , colloquial , mildly vulgar

main_definition: ( chiefly Canada , US , colloquial , mildly vulgar ) Of very poor quality; unpleasant; distasteful.
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly Canada , US , colloquial , mildly vulgar , especially with "feel" ) Bad, sick, or depressed.
( chiefly Canada , US , colloquial , mildly vulgar ) Covered in crap ( faeces / feces ).
